summary: A janitor at an alien nightclub gets his wish to be a singer.
cast: Brad Simonsen|Mortonette Jenkins|Jeff Wolverton|Peter Lurie|Rick Zieff|Dustin Adair|Eric Armstrong|Yakov Baytler|Mary Biondo|Sumit Das|Layne Friedman|Robert Gordon|Franco Pietrantonio|Rick Richards|Chance Thomas|Sully Jacome-Wilkes|Julie Zackary
title: Los Chubb Chubbs
